name: reorderCustomFieldOptions
description:
Changes the order of custom field options or cascading options in a context.

This operation works for custom field options created in Jira or the operations from this resource. **To work with issue field select list options created for Connect apps use the [Issue custom field options (apps)](#api-group-issue-custom-field-options--apps-) operations.**

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

OrderOfCustomFieldOptions.description: An ordered list of custom field option IDs and information on where to move them.

after.description: The ID of the custom field option or cascading option to place the moved options after. Required if `position` isn't provided.

customFieldOptionIds.description: A list of IDs of custom field options to move. The order of the custom field option IDs in the list is the order they are given after the move. The list must contain custom field options or cascading options, but not both.

position.description: The position the custom field options should be moved to. Required if `after` isn't provided.
